description: I love the fact that is has many versions in different languages, very easy to use. Love the interface.
This app is great just the works only pleny of options, noce font selections. Ability to add different English Bibles . Consider adding Indonesian TB translation iff possible.
summary: Well thought out and yet simple Bible app

description: This is a well planned and beautifully executed bible. Many many translations which are often forgotten unfortunately. This should be on android.! Love it !!
summary: Best Bible App in the world!

description: The UI and interface is absolutely modernistic, which is something users are often hard-pressed to find in FOSS bible applications. That being said, it does NOT mesh with GTK at all, and it looks like a badly themed webapp running inside a GTK window but making no attempt to resemble it.
summary: Cute interface and UI, but integrates badly with GTK

description: Intuitive interface, very readable layout with useful settings such as line spacing, and the ability to download lots of good translations. Five stars.
Für alternative bibel as web und die wichtigsten is schon ncht schlecht

Muy buena aplicacion practica y simple pero, muy explicita para hacer comparacion de las escrituras

God Bless you
